t: Amazon launches eco-friendly Aware products as part of its climate promise
s: March 1, 2022 - Bed and bath products, meanwhile, ... reduced ecological footprint. Amazon has long been accused of contributing to waste through its dominance of online shopping. In 2018, it accounted for 5 billion out of 165 billion packages shipped in the US — that's a lot of cardboard, foam and other packing materials.
